SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_LICENSE ML INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON (ML.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE CONFIRM_DATE IS NULL
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT ML.LICENSE_NO LICENSE_NO, L.LICENSE_NAME, ML.MEMBER_NO MEMBER_NO, ML.LICENSE_IMG LICENSE_IMG, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM MEMBER_LICENSE ML INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON (ML.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) INNER JOIN LICENSE L ON (L.LICENSE_NO = ML.LICENSE_NO) WHERE CONFIRM_DATE IS NULL
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT CASE WHEN #{name} = '스터디' THEN STUDY_BOARD_NO WHEN #{name} = '댓글' THEN REPLY_NO WHEN #{name} = '글' THEN BOARD_NO WHEN #{name} = '메세지' THEN MESSAGE_NO WHEN #{name} = '유저' THEN ACCUSED_NO ELSE NULL END AS REPORTED_ID FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_NO = #{reportNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE_BOARD NB INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON (NB.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE NB.STATUS = 'Y'
AND NOTICE_BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT NB.NOTICE_BOARD_NO NOTICE_BOARD_NO, NB.MEMBER_NO MEMBER_NO, NB.NOTICE_BOARD_TITLE NOTICE_BOARD_TITLE, NB.NOTICE_BOARD_CONTENT NOTICE_BOARD_CONTENT, NB.VIEW_COUNT VIEW_COUNT, NB.NOTICE_BOARD_DATE NOTICE_BOARD_DATE, NB.STATUS STATUS, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM NOTICE_BOARD NB INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON (NB.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE NB.STATUS = 'Y'
AND NOTICE_BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
